document_data.caption: [[Selsharra Derissor]], Keeper of the Cerulean Sign
document_data.name: Keepers of the Cerulean Sign
document_data.mainbody: The '''Keepers of the Cerulean Sign''' were an ancient order dedicated to combating [[aberrations]] from the [[Far Realm]].
document_data.Organization: The Keepers were organized into independent groups of chapterhouses and lone individuals. By 1479 DR, most chapterhouses had been overrun and destroyed.
document_data.Possessions: They possessed amulets that grew colder in the presence of aberrations.
document_data.History: They were an ancient order that also had forces in the [[Feywild]] overlooking a border into the [[Far Realm]].
